Class DataService

java.lang.Object
school.management.system.data.DataService
public class DataService extends Object
Handles business logic for data operations like searching, deleting, and fetching.

  • Constructor Details

    • DataService

      public DataService(App app, DB db, UIManager uiManager)
      Constructor for DataService.
      Parameters:
      app - The main application instance.
      db - The database access object.
      uiManager - The UI manager for handling dialogs and progress.

  • Method Details

    • fetchData

      public void fetchData()
      Fetches all data and refreshes the UI tables.

    • searchAndDisplay

      public <T> void searchAndDisplay(String itemType, String[] searchOptions, BiFunction<String,Integer,List<T>> dbSearchFunction, Consumer<List<T>> uiUpdater)
      Generic method to show a search dialog and display results.
      Parameters:
      itemType - The type of item being searched (e.g., "Student", "Teacher").
      searchOptions - The search options to present to the user.
      dbSearchFunction - A function that takes the search term and selected option index, and returns a list of results from the database.
      uiUpdater - A consumer that takes the list of results and updates the UI accordingly.

    • searchStudent

      public void searchStudent(ActionEvent e)
      Initiates a search for students and updates the UI with the results.
      Parameters:
      e - the ActionEvent triggering the search

    • searchTeacher

      public void searchTeacher(ActionEvent e)
      Initiates a search for teachers and updates the UI with the results.
      Parameters:
      e - the ActionEvent triggering the search

    • refreshTableData

      public void refreshTableData()
      Refreshes the data in the main tables with a progress dialog.

    • deleteItem

      public void deleteItem(String itemType, String itemName, Runnable deleteAction)
      Deletes a record from the database after user confirmation.
      Parameters:
      itemType - The type of item being deleted (e.g., "student", "teacher").
      itemName - The name or identifier of the item to display in the confirmation dialog.
      deleteAction - A Runnable encapsulating the deletion logic to execute upon confirmation.

    • searchAndReturn

      public List<Student> searchAndReturn(String searchTerm, int option) throws Exception
      A specific search method that returns results directly instead of updating a UI component. Useful for cases like finding a student for fee payment.
      Returns:
      List
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs

    • getClassName

      public String getClassName(String level)
      Returns a displayable class name when the stored student level is a label. If the provided level string can be parsed to an integer, this delegates to the existing int-based lookup. Otherwise it assumes the level string is already a human-readable label and returns it (or a safe default).
      Parameters:
      level - the class level string
      Returns:
      a String of the displayable class name

    • getClassName

      public String getClassName(int classId)
      returns the displayable class name for a given class ID
      Parameters:
      classId - the ID of the class
      Returns:
      a String of the displayable class name

    • getClassNameById

      public String getClassNameById(int classId) throws Exception

      Parameters:
      classId - the ID of the class
      Returns:
      a String of the class name

      Exception - if an error occurs
